TriggerHistory.hh

00001 #ifndef _TriggerHistory_hh_
00002 #define _TriggerHistory_hh_
00003 
00004 #include <EVENT/LCEvent.h>
00005 #include <EVENT/LCParameters.h>
00006 
00007 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00008 #  include <stdexcept>
00009 #endif
00010 
00011 #include <cassert>
00012 #define  TICKS_TO_NS 25
00013 
00014 namespace CALICE {
00015 
00023 class TriggerHistory
00024 {
00025 public:
00026   TriggerHistory(const EVENT::LCEvent &evt, const std::string &history_name) {
00027     {
00028       std::string pos_name(history_name);
00029       pos_name+="Pos";
00030       evt.getParameters().getIntVals(pos_name, _position);
00031     }
00032     {
00033       std::string bits_name(history_name);
00034       bits_name+="Bits";
00035       evt.getParameters().getIntVals(bits_name, _bits);
00036     }
00037     assert( _bits.size() == _position.size() );
00038   }
00039 
00042   unsigned int getNumberOfElements() const {
00043     return _position.size();
00044   }
00045 
00048   int getTimeDifferenceAt(unsigned int element_i) const {
00049 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00050     if (element_i<getNumberOfElements()) {
00051       throw std::runtime_error("ERROR: element not in trigger history range.");
00052     }
00053 #endif
00054     return _position[element_i]*TICKS_TO_NS; //ns
00055   }
00056 
00059   int getBitsAt(unsigned int element_i) const {
00060 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00061     if (element_i<getNumberOfElements()) {
00062       throw std::runtime_error("ERROR: element not in trigger history range.");
00063     }
00064 #endif
00065     return _bits[element_i];
00066   }
00067 
00068   
00076   unsigned int cleanUntil(int length_in_ns, unsigned int trigger_bit_mask) const {
00077     length_in_ns /= TICKS_TO_NS;
00078     for (unsigned int elm_i=0; elm_i<getNumberOfElements(); elm_i++) {
00079       if (getTimeDifferenceAt(elm_i)>length_in_ns) return 0;
00080       if (getBitsAt(elm_i) & trigger_bit_mask) return elm_i;
00081     }
00082     return 0;
00083   }
00084   
00085 protected:
00086   std::vector<int> _position;
00087   std::vector<int> _bits;
00088 };
00089 
00090 }
00091 #endif
